T02D2177:35a-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2177:35a-5: sdig pa gzhil dang bsod nams 'phel //
T02D2177:35a-6: dgug dang dbang byed gsad pa'i sa //
T02D2177:35a-7: sgrub po rnams la phan btags phyir //
T02D2177:35a-8: bdag gis sbyin sreg bshad par bya //
T02D2177:35a-9: dang po bkra shis gnas dag tu //
T02D2177:35a-10: brtag sogs bsdus rgyas rnam gsum bya //
T02D2177:35a-11: 'bring ni rang nyid gos sngon gyi //
T02D2177:35a-12: ting 'dzin ldan pas bka' bsgo zhing //
T02D2177:35a-13: shar du kha bltas 'byung po la //
T02D2177:35a-14: yid dang mthun pa'i gtor ma sbyin //
T02D2177:35a-15: yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'am //
T02D2177:35a-16: h'um gis yang ni sbyang bar bya //
T02D2177:35a-17: rdo rje phyag rgya de bzhin shes //
T02D2177:35a-18: snying ga'i yi ges skyon sbyangs shing //
T02D2177:35a-19: sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang ba'o //
T02D2177:35a-20: de ni rgyas pa'i rtags sogs 'dod //
T02D2177:35a-21: 'bring ni sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyangs //
T02D2177:35a-22: me tog tshom bu grangs mnyam pa //
T02D2177:35a-23: gzhung bzhin bris pa rdzogs par 'dod //
T02D2177:35a-24: tha ma mdzes pa'i snod dag la //
T02D2177:35b-0: yig 'bru @35b gsum gyis byin brlabs nas //
T02D2177:35b-2: sa skyon sbyang ba gsum shes bya //
T02D2177:35b-3: thab brtsigs rgyar ni khru gang la //
T02D2177:35b-4: zabs su khru phyed zlum pos bskor //
T02D2177:35b-5: sor bzhi gsum ni dor byas la //
T02D2177:35b-6: rdo rje dbus su brgyad pa'i tshad //
T02D2177:35b-7: thab khung dkar po rgyab tu me ri'o //
T02D2177:35b-8: steng du rdo rje phyi rol 'od zer dkar //
T02D2177:35b-9: bud shing dkar po khru gang tshad //
T02D2177:35b-10: tsandan dkar po 'o mas spangs te bzhag / mchod sbyin shing ni mdzub gang tshad //
T02D2177:35b-11: 'dab ma dang bcas rtse mo'i ngos //
T02D2177:35b-12: sngar bzhin spangs pas yam shing bya /
T02D2177:35b-13: dkar gsum mngar gsum mar gyi 'og /'bras chan 'bru ni sna tshogs dang //
T02D2177:35b-14: ku sha yon chab g-yas su gzhag / me tog la sogs bsang gtor dang //
T02D2177:35b-15: zhal bsil rnams ni g-yon du gzhag / dgang gzar dang ni blugs gzar gnyis //
T02D2177:35b-16: mtshan nyid rgyas par gzhan du bstan //
T02D2177:35b-17: yang na g-yas kyi sor mo bskum pa las //
T02D2177:35b-18: yi ge h'um gi 'od zer de yis ni //
T02D2177:35b-19: rdo rje can gyi 'od zer de yis ni //
T02D2177:35b-20: rdo rje can gyi 'od zer bkug pa yis //
T02D2177:35b-21: rdul ba shig ye shes gong bu las //
T02D2177:35b-22: rdo rje khro bo'i dgang gzar gyur //
T02D2177:35b-23: g-yon gyi mthe bos mthe chung mnan //
T02D2177:35b-24: gong bzhin sbyangs nas blugs gzar gyur //
T02D2177:35b-25: de nyid rdo rje dril ni mdun //
T02D2177:35b-26: de nas dkar po'i rgyan cha bgo //
T02D2177:35b-27: yid dang mthun pa'i ku sha'i steng //
T02D2177:35b-28: sems dpa'i skyil krung shar du blta //
T02D2177:35b-29: thab sogs tsandan tshul gtor te //
T02D2177:35b-30: bud shing ma nor zlum por brtsig / de nas rtsva ni ku sha la //
T02D2177:35b-31: aom aa mri ta kunda li sarba bighnam n'a sha ya h'um phat /
T02D2177:35b-32: las kyi sngags kyis bsang gtor bya //
T02D2177:35b-33: bum sbyangs bskyed dgug bzlas pa yis //
T02D2177:35b-34: rtsa gcig bdun gyis 'od zer dgang //
T02D2177:35b-35: thab kyi kho ra khor yug la //
T02D2177:35b-36: ku sha'i rtse mo phyi ru bstan //
T02D2177:35b-37: de nas lha yi rnal 'byor ni //
T02D2177:35b-38: cho ga lnga'am cho ga gsum //
T02D2177:35b-39: skad cig bsdus rgyas shes par bya //
T02D2177:35b-40: thab la sogs pa'i man ngag kyang //
T02D2177:35b-41: las kyi tshogs su shes par bya //
T02D2177:35b-42: de yang slob dpon man ngag gtso //
T02D2177:35b-43: bram ze'i khyim mam gtsub shing me //
T02D2177:36a-0: @36a * // rlung g-yab kyis spar las kyis bsang //
T02D2177:36a-1: sbyang zhing bskyed nas ram dkar pos //
T02D2177:36a-2: me lha dkar po drang srong zhi ba'i tshul //
T02D2177:36a-3: tshangs pa'i skud pa dkar por ldan //
T02D2177:36a-4: phyag na dbyug pa bgrang phreng dang //
T02D2177:36a-7: aom ba pa ka aagna ye a'a gatstsha ya a'a gatsta ya //
T02D2177:36a-8: ma ma sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D2177:36a-9: lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings te spyan drang ngo //
T02D2177:36a-10: bgegs bskrad bstims te mchod pa dbul //
T02D2177:36a-11: rtsa sngags nyid la mchod sngags btags te dbul //
T02D2177:36a-12: aom ba pa ka aagna ye /
T02D2177:36a-13: che ge mo sh'intam ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D2177:36a-14: zhes sreg rdzas dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2177:36a-15: de yi man ngag 'od zer ni //
T02D2177:36a-16: sum skor du ni bya ba dang //
T02D2177:36a-17: nyis skor du ni bya ba dang //
T02D2177:36a-18: bdag nyid rab tu shes par bya //
T02D2177:36a-19: bzhi skor dag dang slob ma'o //
T02D2177:36a-21: thugs dang snying ga brgyud pa dang ;
T02D2177:36a-22: / gsum nas ngag la brgyud pa dang //
T02D2177:36a-23: dbu nas mgo la brgyud pa yi //
T02D2177:36a-24: lus ngag yid kyi sgrib pa sbyang //
T02D2177:36a-25: rtsa ba gsum 'dus bskang bar bya //
T02D2177:36a-26: spyi bo'i gtsug nas brtsams nas ni //
T02D2177:36a-27: sdig dang srin bu zad pa'i phyir //
T02D2177:36a-28: dmar bos bsreg cing dkar pos bkru //
T02D2177:36a-29: sgo dgu dag nas bsdu ba dang //
T02D2177:36a-30: thams cad kun nas bsdu ba dang //
T02D2177:36a-31: snying gar bsdus nas dbyung ba dang //
T02D2177:36a-32: til gyis gzugs brnyan byas nas ni //
T02D2177:36a-33: sdig pa'i gzugs la de gzhug bya //
T02D2177:36a-34: rdzas rnams bdud rtsis mchod pas ni //
T02D2177:36a-35: de nas sdig pa de bsreg bya //
T02D2177:36a-36: yang na rdzas la bstims te bsreg / nad rnams zhi bar byed pa ni //
T02D2177:36a-37: nad kyi ming nas smos nas ni //
T02D2177:36a-38: gong ma de bzhin bsreg pa'am //
T02D2177:36a-39: nad kyi ming dang gzugs bris la //
T02D2177:36a-40: 'od zer dmar pos bsregs nas ni //
T02D2177:36a-41: dkar pos sbyang zhing zhi bsams la //
T02D2177:36a-42: 'byung ba'i dgra rnams de bzhin bsam //
T02D2177:36a-43: 'byung po kun dang dgra kun yang //
T02D2177:36a-44: 'od zer bkye bas zhi bar bsam //
T02D2177:36a-45: gzugs dang ming bris zhi bar bya //
T02D2177:36a-46: sreg rdzas bdud rtsi 'od kyis mchod //
T02D2177:36a-47: mchod pas mnyes pas gong bzhin bskor //
T02D2177:36a-48: de lta min na 'og bzhin no //
T02D2177:36a-49: man ngag de la nan tan bya //
T02D2177:36b-0: mar dang dkar gsum @36b mngar gsum dang //
T02D2177:36b-1: yam shing dkar po zho can dang //
T02D2177:36b-2: de la sogs pa'i thun rdzas rnams //
T02D2177:36b-3: rim pa bzhin du dbul bar bya //
T02D2177:36b-4: til ni med du mi rung ngo //
T02D2177:36b-5: tha ma dgang blugs mthol bshags bya //
T02D2177:36b-6: bstod cing phrin las bcol bar bya //
T02D2177:36b-7: thugs ka nyid du pho brang bca' //
T02D2177:36b-8: skad cig de gsal ye shes dgug / bstim la mchod pa rnam lnga bya //
T02D2177:36b-9: rtsa sngags mchod sngags btags te dbul //
T02D2177:36b-10: sreg rdzas kun kyang de bzhin bya //
T02D2177:36b-11: man ngag rim pa 'dir shes bya //
T02D2177:36b-12: slob dpon zhal nas shes par bya //
T02D2177:36b-13: bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig dag / brgya rtsa brgyad ni bsdus rgyas pa'o //
T02D2177:36b-14: rtsa lnga lnga bcu brgya yis ni //
T02D2177:36b-16: sdig pa che bar gyur na ni //
T02D2177:36b-18: shin tu che gyur stong gi bar //
T02D2177:36b-19: de yis sdig dang bsod nams ni //
T02D2177:36b-20: che chung rab 'bring shes par bya'o //
T02D2177:36b-21: de ltar byas na nges par zhi ;
T02D2177:36b-22: / tha ma dgang blugs mthol bshags bya //
T02D2177:36b-23: bstod cing las bcol gshegs su gsol //
T02D2177:36b-24: ting 'dzin bsdus nas me lhag mas //
T02D2177:36b-25: mchod nas sreg rdzas gong bzhin dbul //
T02D2177:36b-26: dgang blugs la sogs rdzogs byas la //
T02D2177:36b-27: ting 'dzin bsdus te spyod lam bya //
T02D2177:36b-28: thun gsum sbyor ka sbyin sreg la //
T02D2177:36b-29: rnal 'byor can gyis brtson par bya //
